entries.Idea Base:: Based on my Jenocide smallfont. Has simpler shading and bolder glyphs.
Wanted to do a font similar to the one found in Simplicity and Zen Dynamics, but more squarish. Also, Archery Black is just one of the coolest fonts ever.
